name: Zero Waste Europe
membership: ZWE is part of GAIA international and ZWIA.
goal: ZWE is an European independent initiative bringing together organisations and municipalities committed to work to eliminate waste in Europe. ZWE is participating in the international organisation Global Alliance for Incinerator Alternatives (GAIA) and the Zero Waste International Alliance (ZWIA).
interests: Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation
euInitiatives:
ZWE is involved in the revision of the Circular Economy package, including waste package (waste framework directive, landfill directive, ecodesign, etc) but also product, energy and toxics & health policies.
ZWE is also working on climate policies in the field of the internationals COPs, ESD, RED and NECD well as sustainable development goals.
ZWE works on other issues as member of the international network GAIA but these activities don't fall under the register.
